channel.title: Chicago Sites Bush on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Sites Bush on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Well... we may be in trouble
item.description: I was reading through a bunch of sites and I noticed some quite interesting movements in the “world.” First off, the incredible epiphany that two thrids of the world thinks that the U.S. is brought the terror onto itself. Also, in a very scary move, China has apparently been subtly supporting the al-Qaeda. Whoa. I hope bush does not take on the big red. Oh, and I guess the FBI and CIA are looking into a domestic threat of tactical nukes, and they think that nukes me already be here.
